items.sentence: Tom spent all day yesterday studying for today's French test.
Tom said he won't spend another minute working on the report.
You don't realize how important health is until you get sick.
For me, there's nothing more fun to do than to talk with Tom.
Tom married Mary, even though his parents didn't want him to.
You should've listened to my warning when you had the chance.
I woke up with a hangover and didn't feel like going to work.
My daughter held on to my coat sleeve and wouldn't let me go.
I was wondering if you'd like to join me for dinner tomorrow.
I think that it's highly unlikely Tom will ever be satisfied.
